title: AgentTel Overview
description: Agent-ready telemetry dashboard showing topology, baselines, anomalies, and SLO status

targets.query: { span.agenttel.baseline.source != "" } | select(name, span.agenttel.baseline.latency_p50_ms, span.agenttel.baseline.latency_p99_ms, span.agenttel.baseline.error_rate, span.agenttel.baseline.source)

panels.title: SLO Budget Alerts
panels.description: SLO error budget alerts at 50%/25%/10% thresholds

targets.query: { span.agenttel.decision.retryable != nil } | select(name, span.agenttel.decision.retryable, span.agenttel.decision.idempotent, span.agenttel.decision.runbook_url, span.agenttel.decision.escalation_level)

panels.title: GenAI Cost Tracking

targets.query: { span.agenttel.genai.cost_usd > 0 } | select(name, span.gen_ai.request.model, span.gen_ai.usage.input_tokens, span.gen_ai.usage.output_tokens, span.agenttel.genai.cost_usd, span.agenttel.genai.framework)

panels.description: GenAI API call costs by model and framework

panels.title: Deployment Events
panels.description: Deployment events with version and commit info

panels.title: Error Spans with Context

targets.query: { status = error && span.agenttel.topology.team != "" } | select(name, span.agenttel.topology.team, span.agenttel.topology.tier, span.agenttel.decision.retryable, span.agenttel.decision.runbook_url, span.agenttel.decision.escalation_level, span.agenttel.decision.fallback_available)

panels.description: Error spans with full agent-actionable context for incident response
